ca.concordia.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.concordia.model.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HumanPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a typical player.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Pouria, Parsa

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Player(java.lang.String p_name)
      Creates a player with the argument player name and sets default value for rest of the player fields.

      • next_order

        public Order next_order()
        Method that is called by the GameEngine during the execute orders phase and returns the first order in the player’s list of orders, then removes it from the list.
        Returns:
        l_result the first order object in the player’s list of orders.

      • next_type

        public Orders next_type()
